content: 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 4/4 for the small pumpkin attach with a slip_stitch around on of the fpdc from round 2 single_crochet in each of the six fpdc on from round 2 join with a slip_stitch single_crochet around three more times bind off sew shut for a larger pumpkin attach with a slip_stitch around on of the fpdc from round 2 chain 1 double_crochet in the next fpdc chain 1 around round 2 chain 2 fpdc in the next st bpdc around the next st around round 3 and 4 repeat round 2 stuff and sew shut vine using green yarn make a chain about 15 chain long or how ever long you want single_crochet in the second chain from hook and in all the other chains it will curl on its own sew this to you pumpkin there are many different ways you can make your pumpkin one you get the hang of it you can make them tall and skinny fat and round or even pear shaped it s all up to your imagination that is why i call this a recipe this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa
